name: ⋮ Tap The Poo ⋮
description:
You can call this a Flappy Bird clone, but its the funniest clone ever made.

1 - Explosions
2 - Funny Sounds
3 - Hours of Fun
4 - 5 Different Characters
5 - Voice Overs
6 - Smooth Physics
7 - Game Centre
8 - Share with your friends

Have you got what it takes to become a Poo King. Try and achieve the Chilly if you dare!
